articles.description: The financial ombudsman anticipates compensation claims to soar in the new financial year, leading a trade association to say it is a “scandal” and a “regulation failure”.
articles.content: As part of its Plan and Budget for 2021/22, the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) has set out levy requirements for the industry (firms pay to fund the body which provides compensation to… [+2463 chars]

articles.title: Brand Beckham: The secret to David's incredible money-making influence - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Business filings show that it's David, not Victoria, bringing in the dough. So, where does his cash (and appeal) come from?
articles.content: The Beckhams are flush, then, but it appears to be David thats bringing in the major cash. And for a 45-year-old, long-retired former footballer with few discernible talents outside of the game, that… [+1768 chars]
